thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 30 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Samsung Life plans $1.1 bln Samsung Elec stake sale

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Samsung Life plans $1.1 bln Samsung Elec stake sale
text:
SEOUL, May 30 (Reuters) - Samsung Life Insurance Co Ltd said on Wednesday it had decided to sell part of its shares in Samsung Electronics Co Ltd worth 1.2 trillion won ($1.1 billion).
The insurance firm said in a regulatory filing that the disposal was to preemptively remove regulatory risks. ($1 = 1,080.0700 won) (Reporting by Ju-min Park and Joyce Lee; Editing by Stephen Coates)
